item.title: CVE-2024-34568|2024-06-04T17:42:28.708Z -- themeqx -- letterpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themeqx LetterPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects LetterPress: from n/a through 1.2.1.
